name: Arrow (itch) (MiniCube11)
description:
Arrow
by MiniCube11

- Move your mouse to dodge enemy arrows
- Collect diamonds to buy arrow skins

- Hover your mouse over your score to see your personal best score and the cloud high score

Check out the Scratch project: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/401127257/

-Credits-
Code and Art:  MiniCube11
Music: Vexento - Spark
